title: The Big Game
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 46 words, Level B (Grade K), Lexile 90L
description: In The Big Game, students will read about what some families do on game day, besides watch the game. Detailed illustrations, high-frequency words, and repetitive phrases support early emergent readers. Students will also have the opportunity to locate details that support the main idea as they read this fun-filled story.
meta: cheer, dress up, football, friends, game, watch
